title: Handle a Data Breach Response
description: A company has experienced a data breach. In-house counsel must coordinate the legal response.

tasks.description: Review the relevant state data breach notification laws to understand the company's obligations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the legal requirements for notification, including timing and content.

tasks.description: Work with the IT department to understand the scope of the breach: what data was taken and how many individuals were affected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the key facts of the incident.

tasks.description: Draft the required notification letters to be sent to affected individuals and the state attorney general.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares the legally required notifications.
